name: Cis-app
body:
### Welcome to CIS APP > iPhone/iPad App for RVC CIS Division. see screenshots of app: http://bit.ly/rvccisapp **How to test app:** 1) If interested in testing above app, please install **UDID Tool** app to your iPhone/iPad * Download and install UDID Tool: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/udid-tool/id377602501?mt=8 * Run UDID Tool app and send UDID to: konkolapps@gmail.com * Wait for email from konkolapps@gmail.com before going to step 2. 2) Install & Test App **Download and install CIS App (iPhone/iPad)** * Install via Link: https://ota.io/cbrezb * Install via Scan (Need [SCAN APP](http://bit.ly/scanappios) to scan QR Code) * ![CISAPP](http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chs=200x200&cht=qr&chld=|1&chl=http%3A%2F%2Fqr.w69b.com%2Fg%2FqwO5MOYEg) 3) Post Feedback/Issues * https://mycisapp.uservoice.com/ ### Items to test: * Does app open? * Can you navigate to pages? * Is screen layout easy to use? * What suggestions do you have on: Text, layout, colors, videos, content?
Page Views:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
